traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The priest can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells: * Cantrips (at will): blade ward, gust, light, prestidigitation, shocking grasp * 1st level (4 slots): featherfall, shield, witch bolt * 2nd level (3 slots): dust devil, gust of wind * 3rd level (2 slots): gaseous form

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The priest makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
